products.title: Carlina Thistle Teal Blue Roman Blind
products.description: Their carlina thistle teal blue roman blind, a 100% cotton-based fabric, celebrates the wild-side of the countryside, with a saturated medium blue background featuring a stunning traditional grey pattern, this roman blind is a stunning statement piece. Why not accessorise your room with complementary grey or white accessories to further enhance your surroundings. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this roman comes with their free five year guarantee and customer-first service.

products.description: Opal, a beautiful soft fabric is available in 5 powerful tones that will look great in your home. This grey roman blind will add a luxurious feel to any room in your home and will look great alongisde neutral decor due to its tone. Product id: db-rom0759 fabric colour: sterling material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets.
